verses.text: \w The|strong="H0853"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* Jeremias \w from|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w tenth|strong="H6224"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Sedecias \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Juda: \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w same|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w eighteenth|strong="H6240"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Nabuchodonosor.

\w At|strong="H5921"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w time|strong="H0227"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w army|strong="H2428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w o|strong="H1004"\w* \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w* besieged \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*: \w and|strong="H3063"\w* Jeremias \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w shut|strong="H3607"\w* \w up|strong="H5921"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w court|strong="H2691"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w prison|strong="H1004"\w*, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Juda.

\w For|strong="H3027"\w* Sedecias \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Juda \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w shut|strong="H3607"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w up|strong="H5414"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Why|strong="H4069"\w* dost thou \w prophesy|strong="H5012"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Thus|strong="H3541"\w* saith \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*: \w Behold|strong="H2005"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w into|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w take|strong="H3920"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w*?

\w And|strong="H3063"\w* Sedecias \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Juda \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w escape|strong="H4422"\w* \w out|strong="H7200"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Chaldeans|strong="H3778"\w*: \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* \w into|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*: \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* lead Sedecias \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w* \w till|strong="H5704"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w visit|strong="H6485"\w* \w him|strong="H0853"\w*, saith \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*. \w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w if|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w fight|strong="H3898"\w* \w against|strong="H0854"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Chaldeans|strong="H3778"\w*, \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w success|strong="H6743"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* Jeremias \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w The|strong="H0559"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*:

\w Behold|strong="H2009"\w*, Hanameel \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Sellum thy cousin \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* thee, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Buy|strong="H7069"\w* thee \w my|strong="H0834"\w* \w field|strong="H7704"\w*, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w Anathoth|strong="H6068"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* thy \w right|strong="H4941"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w buy|strong="H7069"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w*, \w being|strong="H1121"\w* akin.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* Hanameel \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w uncle’s|strong="H1730"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* cam \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*, \w according|strong="H4941"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* entry \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* prison, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*: \w Buy|strong="H7069"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* held, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w right|strong="H4941"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w inheritance|strong="H3425"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* thins, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* thou art \w next|strong="H0413"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* kin \w to|strong="H0413"\w* possess \w it|strong="H1931"\w*. \w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w understood|strong="H3045"\w* \w this|strong="H1931"\w* \w was|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w bought|strong="H7069"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* held \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w my|strong="H0834"\w* \w uncle’s|strong="H1730"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w in|strong="H1121"\w* \w Anathoth|strong="H6068"\w*: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w weighed|strong="H8254"\w* \w him|strong="H0853"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w money|strong="H3701"\w*, \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* staters, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w pieces|strong="H8255"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3701"\w* I \w wrote|strong="H3789"\w* \w it|strong="H3789"\w* \w in|strong="H3789"\w* \w a|strong="H3789"\w* \w book|strong="H5612"\w* \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w sealed|strong="H2856"\w* \w it|strong="H3789"\w*, \w and|strong="H3701"\w* took \w witnesses|strong="H5707"\w*: \w and|strong="H3701"\w* I \w weighed|strong="H8254"\w* him \w the|strong="H3789"\w* \w money|strong="H3701"\w* \w in|strong="H3789"\w* \w the|strong="H3789"\w* \w balances|strong="H3976"\w*.

\w And|strong="H2706"\w* I \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w deed|strong="H5612"\w* \w of|strong="H5612"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w purchase|strong="H4736"\w* \w that|strong="H5612"\w* was \w sealed|strong="H2856"\w*, \w and|strong="H2706"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* stipulations, \w and|strong="H2706"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* ratifications \w with|strong="H4736"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w seals|strong="H2856"\w* \w that|strong="H5612"\w* \w were|strong="H5612"\w* on \w the|strong="H0853"\w* outside.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w deed|strong="H5612"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w purchase|strong="H4736"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Baruch|strong="H1263"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Neri \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Maasias \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Hanameel \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w uncle’s|strong="H1730"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w presence|strong="H5869"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w witnesses|strong="H5707"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* subscribed \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w book|strong="H5612"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w purchase|strong="H4736"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w before|strong="H5869"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Jews|strong="H3064"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w sat|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w court|strong="H2691"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* prison.
\w And|strong="H5869"\w* \w I|strong="H6680"\w* \w charged|strong="H6680"\w* \w Baruch|strong="H1263"\w* \w before|strong="H5869"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*:

\w Thus|strong="H3541"\w* saith \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: \w Take|strong="H3947"\w* \w these|strong="H0428"\w* writings, \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w deed|strong="H5612"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w purchase|strong="H4736"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w sealed|strong="H2856"\w* \w up|strong="H5975"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w deed|strong="H5612"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w open|strong="H1540"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w an|strong="H5414"\w* \w earthen|strong="H2789"\w* \w vessel|strong="H3627"\w*, \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w they|strong="H3117"\w* \w may|strong="H0430"\w* \w continue|strong="H5975"\w* \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w thus|strong="H3541"\w* saith \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: \w Houses|strong="H1004"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w fields|strong="H7704"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w vineyards|strong="H3754"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H5750"\w* \w possessed|strong="H7069"\w* \w again|strong="H5750"\w* \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w deed|strong="H5612"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w purchase|strong="H4736"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Baruch|strong="H1263"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Neri, \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w prayed|strong="H6419"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*:

\w Alas|strong="H0162"\w*, \w alas|strong="H0162"\w*, \w alas|strong="H0162"\w*, \w O|strong="H3069"\w* \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \w God|strong="H0136"\w*, \w behold|strong="H2009"\w* thou hast \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w* \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* \w by|strong="H3605"\w* thy \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w power|strong="H2220"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* thy \w stretched|strong="H5186"\w* \w out|strong="H4480"\w* \w arm|strong="H2220"\w*: \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w hard|strong="H1419"\w* \w to|strong="H0776"\w* thee:

Thou shewest \w mercy|strong="H3068"\w* unto \w thousands|strong="H0505"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* returnest \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* \w into|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w bosom|strong="H2436"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*: \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w most|strong="H6635"\w* \w mighty|strong="H1368"\w*, \w great|strong="H1419"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w powerful|strong="H1368"\w*, \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w name|strong="H8034"\w*.

\w Great|strong="H1419"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w counsel|strong="H6098"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* incomprehensible \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w thought|strong="H5869"\w*: \w whose|strong="H0834"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w are|strong="H0834"\w* \w open|strong="H6491"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w ways|strong="H1870"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Adam, \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w render|strong="H5414"\w* unto \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w one|strong="H0376"\w* \w according|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w according|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* devices.

\w Who|strong="H0834"\w* hast \w set|strong="H7760"\w* \w signs|strong="H0226"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w wonders|strong="H4159"\w* \w in|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* \w even|strong="H5704"\w* \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w in|strong="H0776"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* amongst \w men|strong="H0120"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* hast \w made|strong="H6213"\w* thee \w a|strong="H7760"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w at|strong="H3478"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3478"\w* hast \w brought|strong="H3318"\w* \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* thy \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* \w with|strong="H4714"\w* \w signs|strong="H0226"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w with|strong="H4714"\w* \w wonders|strong="H4159"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w with|strong="H4714"\w* \w a|strong="H3318"\w* \w strong|strong="H2389"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w a|strong="H3318"\w* \w stretched|strong="H5186"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w arm|strong="H0248"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w with|strong="H4714"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w terror|strong="H4172"\w*.
